images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful young Japanese model, embodying a top-tier gravure idol aesthetic. She’s posed by a large window on a plush, cream-colored sofa, bathed in backlit sunlight creating a soft silhouette. She wears a Korean preppy-inspired outfit: a fitted, slightly cropped, ribbed knit cardigan in heather grey layered over a delicate white lace camisole, paired with a high-waisted, dark wash denim mini-skirt. Her straight, black, silky hair cascades over her shoulders. A half-empty champagne flute rests delicately in her hand. Her expression is a gentle, soft smile—cool, independent, and subtly alluring. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, maximizing depth of field and utilizing ray tracing and global illumination to capture realistic skin texture (visible pores, vellus hair) and a subtly desaturated, muted color grade. Background bokeh of a modern, minimalist apartment.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup

A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful young Japanese model, embodying a top-tier gravure idol aesthetic, in a luxurious hotel room. She wears a delicate, barely-there ivory lace bikini set, subtly adorned with pearlescent beading, layered beneath a flowing, sheer silk kimono-style cover-up in a blush rose hue – the fabric gently clinging to her curves. She’s reclining amongst plush cream-colored pillows and a soft cashmere blanket, legs elegantly extended. A low angle shot (顯腿長) emphasizes her long, slender limbs. Her expression is subtly seductive, lightly biting her lip (輕咬嘴唇) as she glances towards the camera. Overcast soft sky light (陰天柔和自然光) bathes the scene, creating a warm and golden tone (溫暖金黃色調). Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, with exquisite depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination for unparalleled realism and bokeh.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
